response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, worth $1,500,000. I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am proposing to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This price not only reflects its true worth but also provides you with a significant advantage compared to what others might pay in the market. Please let me know if this offer meets your requirements, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
